name: beszel
tagline: A lightweight monitoring dashboard showing real-time server resource metrics
description: Beszel is a lightweight server monitoring dashboard that supports resource metrics across multiple machines. It offers real-time stats for CPU, RAM, disk, and network usage through a sleek web-based interface.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track resource metrics across multiple machines from one dashboard. Centralized visibility

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Live monitoring of CPU, RAM, disk, and network usage. Instant performance insights

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource footprint won't slow down your servers. Efficient monitoring

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Modern, intuitive dashboard for easy navigation. Beautiful data visualization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your monitoring infrastructure and data. Privacy guaranteed
